description:
The son of Yoawen Chen. Guizhang trains under his father to learn his trading business while working as his bodyguard. He is passionate, but he keeps his emotions to himself, which makes him seem cool and calm. He was born in Yokohama and was taught martial arts by his father from a young age. Since Ryo has a similar upbringing as him, although Guizhang acts cold he feels close to Ryo.
Source: Official site
name: Chen Guizhang
